Pulse Docs

Overview

Welcome to the mock documentation portal used to validate AgenticTest. Everything here is static content powered by Eleventy and Lunr, but the navigation flows, anchors, and search interactions mimic a real docs system.

Goals

  • Provide a dense, scroll-heavy page for keyboard navigation tests.
  • Expose anchor links, code snippets, and callouts to drive UI selectors.
  • Serve as the landing page for overview trace replays.

Whatâ€™s inside

  1. CLI basics: Understand commands and flags.
  2. Guides: Learn how to trace workflows and test playbooks.
  3. Reference: Configuration schema and API details.

Because this is strictly a validation site, all data is mocked. Expand sections by editing markdown in apps/docs-portal/content.
